entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Thursday 23 March 2023
